divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving on Galloway Road in Bensalem (toward Hulmeville), passing the shopping center at the corner of Galloway and Hulmeville Rds. I noticed out my driver side window large red, white and blue lights flashing erratically, about 30 ft up in the air, in front of a Bar in the shopping center. I couldn't really see the object, as I was driving. Once I was able to stop, it was gone.
Summary: I was driving and saw red, white and blue lights flashing (red and blue on top, white below) erratically about 30 ft up in the air. By the time I was able to stop to look, it was gone.
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Bensalem
There were no other sightings in Bensalem on or around December 5th 2008
